details.title: A Proposal Model to Monitor Interdisciplinary Research Projects in Latin American Universities
details.abstract: For many years, the Latin American university model was aimed at training technicians and professionals. These universities are now trying to develop a pertinent environment for scientific innovation that could contribute to the development of the region. Maybe, interdisciplinary projects are a key part of this environment, if we can agree on the meaning of interdisciplinarity and how to achieve it. This paper proposes a model to monitor interdisciplinarity.
details.journal_title: IEEE Revista Iberoamericana de Tecnologias del Aprendizaje
